com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.swt.adapter

Class SwtAdapterFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.swt.adapter.SwtAdapterFactory

  • public class SwtAdapterFactory
extends Object
    A factory for creating Acrolinx Java SDK adapters for SWT objects. Use INSTANCE.
